channel.title: Wilderness Problem!READ PLEASE
channel.description:
Ok,i have a problem,my server has great pking,BUT everytime i'm bout to ko somone,they teleport like a noob...i know thats what teleblock is for,BUT have the time i don't react in time,so i was wondering if anyone knew a code to make it like right when they enter the pkzone it auto teleblocks them where they can't tele in wild,if you can help me,please post the code to explain,ANY help would be greatly appericated,thanks
~Cody
